title: Win It Weekly: SRAM Rival eTap AXS Group with Power Meter
content:
How does Win It Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a SRAM Rival eTap AXS group with power meter.

Prize:

  • A SRAM Rival eTap AXS group with power meter
  • MSRP US$1,639

Prize Details:

Experience a better bike ride. SRAM Rival eTap AXS features the technology modern riders want — intuitive wireless shifting, innovative gearing, integrated power measurement, AXS connectivity, and refined hydraulic disc brakes. It’s low on complexity, but rich with features. The winner can choose a Rival eTap AXS drivetrain with power meter and flat mount hydraulic disc brakes in the gearing configuration of their choice, either 1x or 2x.

The post Win It Weekly: SRAM Rival eTap AXS Group with Power Meter appeared first on CyclingTips.
author: CyclingTips
